thread.title: It doesn't add up for Huskies
thread.title_full: It doesn't add up for Huskies

author:
Neill Ostrout
Journal Inquirer
title: It doesn't add up for Huskies
text:
Mary Schwalm Running quarterback 
UConn quarterback Bryant Shirreffs (4) picks up some of his 100 rushing yards on a first-half carry. He also threw for 365 yards, but it wasn't enough to prevent a 28-20 loss to South Florida. (AP Photo/Mary Schwalm) Posted: Saturday, October 17, 2015 5:56 pm Journal Inquirer Journal   
By Neill Ostrout 
Journal Inquirer 
EAST HARTFORD _ The University of Connecticut football team’s offense came alive Saturday.
